description: Example input and output flow of the Van Gogh Museum AI Assistant.

results.content:
Category: Tickets
Info: Tickets for the Van Gogh Museum are only available online. Tickets are not sold at the door. Visitors must book a time slot in advance.

Category: Visitor Info
Info: The museum is open daily, though opening hours may vary by season. Generally, it is open from 09:00 AM to 06:00 PM.

flow.data: Tickets for the Van Gogh Museum are only available online, and you must book a time slot in advance. The museum does not sell tickets at the door.
